messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a class of 15 students. Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Gongxue are all connected to each other. Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Pierre, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Soheil are all connected to each other. Noah, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Anisha are connected to each other. Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Anisha are connected to each other. Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim are connected to each other. Soheil is connected to Alice. Durga, Ajit and Anisha are connected to each other. Shanshan is connected to Vadim. Gongxue is connected to Alice. Ajit is connected to Anisha. You are connected with Vivian and a new app appears in which you can connect to anyone only once. From Vivian, what is the connection path that yields the most reward? Please list the student names in order, separated by commas.

Step 1: Identify the groups of connected students.
Group 1: Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Gongxue
Group 2: Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, Alice
Group 3: Pierre, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Soheil
Group 4: Noah, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Anisha
Group 5: Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, Alice
Group 6: Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Anisha
Group 7: Salma, Shanshan, Vadim
Group 8: Soheil, Alice
Group 9: Durga, Ajit, Anisha
Group 10: Shanshan, Vadim
Group 11: Gongxue, Alice
Group 12: Ajit, Anisha

Step 2: Determine the connections from Vivian.
Vivian is connected to Group 1.

Step 3: Determine the connections from Group 1.
Salma connects to Group 4 and Group 7.
Shanshan connects to Group 4, Group 7, and Group 10.
Vadim connects to Group 4, Group 7, and Group 10.
Gongxue connects to Group 2, Group 5, and Group 11.

Step 4: Determine the connections from the connected groups.
Group 4 connects to Group 6 and Group 12.
Group 7 has no further connections.
Group 10 has no further connections.
Group 2 connects to Group 3 and Group 8.
Group 5 has no further connections.
Group 11 has no further connections.

Step 5: Determine the connections from the connected groups.
Group 6 has no further connections.
Group 12 has no further connections.
Group 3 has no further connections.
Group 8 has no further connections.

Step 6: Calculate the number of connections for each path.
Path 1: Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Gongxue (5 connections)
Path 2: Vivian, Salma, Noah, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Anisha (7 connections)
Path 3: Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim (4 connections)
Path 4: Vivian, Salma, Shanshan (3 connections)
Path 5: Vivian, Gongxue, Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Alice (6 connections)
Path 6: Vivian, Gongxue, Solomon, Soheil, Alice (5 connections)
Path 7: Vivian, Gongxue, Alice (3 connections)

Step 7: Choose the path with the most connections.
The path with the most connections is Path 2.

Answer: Vivian, Salma, Noah, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Anisha

teleShortcut.parsed_response: Answer: Vivian, Salma, Noah, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Anisha
